dmca.title: Police du Net DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google

works.description:
Abuse Report - Copyright
Object: Link redirecting to illegal copyright content

Link:
http://www.findthatfile.com/search-2008913-nMP3/audio-download-106450-mp3-a-b-inner-sanctumefnet-orange-tropical-passion-fr-2011-qfc-04-chamoire.m3u.htm
http://www.free-download-song.com/FS-FSC-Orange-Orange-Tropical-Passion-FR-2011-QFC_6787672.html
http://mp3.uzhgorod.name/2011/10/20/orange-orange-tropical-passion-2011.html
http://thewarezscene.org/forums/orange-orange-tropical-passion-fr-2011-qfc-t11542475.html
http://www.legalsounds.com/download-mp3/orange-orange/tropical-passion/rototom-party-girl/song_4835894
http://rapidlibrary.com/files/orange-orange-tropical-passion-fr-2011-qfc-rar_ul8vzqxyyci99on.html
http://www.emusic.com/listen/#/album/orange-orange/tropical-passion/12841100/



The registered French office Police du net and its legal representative Jessica Gagnon , Agent of Police du net.
We have noticed that some of our client product is available without our prior authorization. 
It concerns the following album :

Détails
Artist :Orange orange
Album:Tropical Passion
Copyright: Distribution Select
Agent Authorize: Police Du Net

In these circumstances, we ask you to remove and to ban any search queries that may contain links concerning this album in agreement with your DMCA policy.

I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, (If you need the document approval reply me with your email and i will send it to you)

I have a good faith belief that use of the aforementioned material is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or the law

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thanks for your comprehension and the artist work
Best regards,
Jessica Gagnon
survey@policedunet.com
Police Du Net,
281 de la réserve
Quebec,Ca
G7J 3N3
